summary: Motivated Construction Manager with strong knowledge of civil engineering principles, experienced in leading teams on large-scale residential and commercial construction projects.

experience.title: Project Construction Manager
experience.description: Reviewed plans and specs during schematic design; coordinated utility service providers; led weekly production and operations contractor meetings; performed site observations; reported to VP of production; managed pre-installation conferences; archived progress photos and closeout documents; determined project schedule and sequence of activities; provided safety kits; prepared progress reports; offered technical assistance; guided third-party inspectors; ensured timely site inspections; supported emergency repair and restoration on oil and natural gas pipelines; scheduled contractors and material deliveries; trained onsite crew.

experience.title: Project Construction Engineer
experience.description: Coordinated and directed site activities; enforced safety procedures; oversaw fabrication and erection works; coordinated with client representatives; managed multiple projects including onshore gas development, Ras Laffan LNG, and Khatiya degassing upgrades; ensured compliance with NPCC and client HSE standards.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Petroleum Engineering

certifications: Professional Project Management Program (PMP) - Cambridge Educational Institute, Abu Dhabi, 2009
